column1: The seminar leader was well prepared
column2: The seminar leader gave interesting and informative classes
column3: The seminar leader explained the subject clearly
column4: The seminar leader was effective in leading the class or seminar
column5: The seminar leader is receptive to students' questions
column6: The seminar leader stimulates interest in the subject
column7: The seminar leader stimulates discussion on the subject
column8: The seminar leader stimulates me to think and learn
column9: The seminar leader has a good rapport with the class
column10: The seminar leader is available to answer questions during office hours
column11: What have been the positive features of this module up to this point?
column12: Were there any negative features of this module up to this point? What aspects of the module might be improved?
Is it possible to have more online quizzes as they are just very convenient.

column11: hugo explains things that aren’t necessarily explained very well in the lectures (the seminars are more helpful than the lectures)
Well structured lecture notes that are clear and easy to understand, seminar exercises clarify the topics
column12: Pace of the lectures could be faster/ cover things that supplement the reading rather than just repeat it

column11: This module has greatly increased my interests in parts of philosophy such as logic and gave me a great idea of what fields in philosophy I will be interested in further into my course.
I have actually enjoyed this even though its math. Yuck. It has been genuinely very interesting and I've been able to keep up.
Very clear explanations of topics discussed in lecture. Encourages participation and engagement among the class. Receptive to differing ideas and willing to re-explain points of confusion.
Hugo has been very attentive to students' questions and needs regarding the module, it helps understand a lot!
clear explanations, provides context and interesting facts to what we learn
Open debates about the questions and clear answers to student questions.
i like the structure - consistently having questions to work through to test understanding is good.
column12: could potentially choose people to answer questions quicker when no one is answering - keep the seminar from stalling with lengthy silences

column11: We've had many interesting discussions in seminars and debates, with careful consideration of the points made by all sides. The teaching is done clearly and in a helpful way so that I feel confident in the topics.
Hugo is helpful when explaining material and makes it easier to understand

- explains things clearly when you don’t understand
- allows for discussion when the answers to things are nuanced or unclear
I have found the subject applicable to other areas of my studies, and the lecture and seminar leaders are friendly and engaging
I like the exercises to do every week because it helps me to stay on top of things
It’s a good, clear seminar and he is easy to understand
column12: The pace could go faster- we spend most if not all the seminar go through all the answers which we get on the online version anyway
